adjective.description: Of, relating to, or resembling a woodlouse; (later) specifically of or relating to the suborder Oniscoidea, which comprises the woodlice and allied forms.

noun.description: A crustacean of the suborder Oniscoidea, especially a woodlouse.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in The Century Dictionary. From Oniscus + -oid.
